tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Paintings (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	painting_name VARCHAR(255),
	painting_artist VARCHAR(255),
	painting_year INT,
	restoration_history TEXT,
	condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE painting (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    creation_year INT,
    condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE restoration (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id UUID REFERENCES painting(id),
    restoration_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    restorer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE paintings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    artist VARCHAR,
    year_created INT,
    restoration_history TEXT,
    condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE restoration_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id INT REFERENCES paintings(id),
    restoration_date DATE,
    restoration_details TEXT,
    restorer VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Paintings (
    painting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    creation_year INT,
    condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Restoration (
    restoration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id INT REFERENCES Paintings(painting_id),
    restoration_date DATE,
    restoration_description TEXT,
    restoration_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory (
    treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    restoration_id INT REFERENCES Restoration(restoration_id),
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    treatment_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Gallery (
    gallery_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gallery_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Paintings (
    painting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    creation_year INT,
    condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    treatment_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (painting_id) REFERENCES Paintings(painting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    painting_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT,
    conservator_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (painting_id) REFERENCES Paintings(painting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    ownership_start DATE,
    ownership_end DATE,
    painting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (painting_id) REFERENCES Paintings(painting_id)
);
